item.title: Words are viral too
item.description: On the 9 January 2020, the New York Times published an article with the following headline, ‘China Identifies New Virus Causing Pneumonialike Illness’ Little did we know back then the scale of the pandemic that awaited us. Hauntingly, the article was prefaced with a statment that there was ‘no evidence of human-to-human transmission’. Alert levels were low. But then, just 11 days later on the 20 January 2020, a new article was published which confirmed our worst fears,
